name: tribal-knowledge-deep-agent
description: Deep agent system for automatic database schema documentation and semantic search

scripts.document:clean: rm -rf docs/ progress/documenter-progress.json && echo 'Cleared docs/ and progress (preserved plan)'
scripts.document:fresh: npm run document:clean && npm run document
scripts.index:fresh: npm run index:clean && npm run index
scripts.pipeline: npm run plan && npm run document && npm run index
scripts.pipeline:fresh: npm run document:clean && npm run index:clean && npm run pipeline
scripts.pipeline:deploy: npm run pipeline && npm run sync
scripts.pipeline:fresh:deploy: npm run pipeline:fresh && npm run sync
scripts.test:integration: docker-compose -f tests/fixtures/docker-compose.test.yml up -d && sleep 5 && vitest run tests/planner/integration.test.ts; docker-compose -f tests/fixtures/docker-compose.test.yml down
